stc:class.name: RunInteractiveMethodologyCommand

stc:attribute.value: Methodology Manager

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Handle of the StmTestCase object to get features for.

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: JSON-formatted string used to modify the parameters of the test.

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Methodology Manager

stc:class.name: GetMethodologyObjectsCommand

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Test Methodology Key

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Test Case Key (Optional)

stc:attribute.value: Handle of the Test Case corresponding to the key specified by TestCaseKey that is returned by the command.

stc:attribute.name: none

stc:attribute.value: True runs the resource check on the modules being used. False disables the resource check.

stc:attribute.name: none

stc:attribute.value: Methodology Manager

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: JSON string representing the configuration of the STM test case.

stc:attribute.name: none
